javadoc:
typedef struct _IMAGE_RESOURCE_DIRECTORY_ENTRY {
     union {
         struct {
             DWORD NameOffset:31;
             DWORD NameIsString:1;
         };
         DWORD   Name;
         WORD    Id;
     };
     union {
         DWORD   OffsetToData;
         struct {
             DWORD   OffsetToDirectory:31;
             DWORD   DataIsDirectory:1;
         };
     };
 };

methods.name: <init>

params.name: index
params.comment: the index where this directory begins

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if the parent resource directory is named,
 false indicates an ID.
methods.name: isNameEntry
methods.comment:
Returns true if the parent resource directory is named,
 false indicates an ID.

methods.name: getNameOffset
methods.comment: Returns the offset to the name of this resource.

return.comment: the offset to the name of this resource

methods.name: getNameIsString
methods.comment: Returns the ID of the name of this resource.

return.comment: the ID of the name of this resource

methods.javadoc: @return either an integer ID or a pointer to a structure that contains a string name

return.comment: either an integer ID or a pointer to a structure that contains a string name
